name: Ancient Architect
stat text: 10% chance to avoid Projectiles

name: Champion of the Hollows
stat text: You cannot be frozen if you've been frozen recently

name: Drek, Apex Hunter
stat text: Cannot be Blinded. You cannot be Maimed

name: Eater of Souls
stat text: Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you have taken a critical strike recently

name: Erebix, Light's Bane
stat text: Enemies that have hit you with an attack recently have 8% reduced attack speed

name: Fragment of Winter
stat text: 50% reduced Effect of Chill on you

name: Glace
stat text: 30% increased Stun and block Recovery

name: Gorulis, Will-Thief
stat text: 60% increased life Recovery from Flasks used when on low life

name: Kitava, The Destroyer
stat text: 50% chance to avoid Ailments from Critical Strikes

name: Mephod, the Earth Scorcher
stat text: 50% reduced ignite Duration on you. 10% increased movement speed while on Burning Ground

name: Queen of the Great Tangle
stat text: 50% increased Recovery rate of life and energy shield if you've stopped taking Damage Over Time recently

name: Shavronne the Sickening
stat text: 30% reduced Effect of shock on you. 30% reduced shock duration on you

name: Shock and Horror
stat text: 5% chance to dodge attack and spell hits if you've been hit recently

name: Stalker of the Endless Dunes
stat text: 6% increased movement speed if you haven't been hit recently

name: Tahsin, Warmaker
stat text: While stationary, gain 0.5% of life Regenerated per second every second, up to a maximum of 2%

name: Terror of the Infinite Drifts
stat text: 50% less Duration of poisons on You. You cannot be poisoned while there are at least 5 poisons on you

name: The Hallowed Husk
stat text: Avoid Projectiles that have Chained

name: Thraxia
stat text: +25% chaos resistance against Damage Over Time

name: Varhesh, Shimmering Aberration
stat text: 5% reduced cold damage taken if you've been hit recently
